page.title: 19Religion in Luddington
page.content: Services are not generally well attended with as few as 3,but usually 15 to 20 regular attenders.The major festivals are all fairly well attended with approx.60 to 70 attending Easter,Harvest Festival and Christmas Services. Recently the church building has been improved with electricity replacing oil lamps five years ago and complete redecoration by a Manpower services group last year. Unfortunately expenses are no longer met by the weekly collections and outside events have to be held to raise funds.The major one in Luddington is the "Rose Queen Fete" which is held in June.However,the church has received many gifts in the form of altar linen,brasses and tapestry hassocks recently.
